issue.title: [C++] Native database interfaces
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11670](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11670). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Meta-task for adding native database interfaces to Arrow C++.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11670?focusedCommentId=17392866) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
It's not obvious to me that this should be maintained inside Arrow, rather than as third-party projects.
I can envision the build and CI consequences of having to interact with all those systems on an optional basis.

`[~npr]` thoughts?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11670?focusedCommentId=17393089) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
You're probably right (though it's also probably good to track the work here)
